description: Episode of Series "The Facts Are These". A study of drug misuse among the young people of a typical urban area. Considers the social acceptability and medical uses of certain types of drugs and the effects of some drugs on the workings of the body. An ex-addict discusses his experiences. Finally a psychiatrist warns of the dangers inherent in casual experimentation.
